title: EBRD Shareholders and Board of Governors
snippet: While retaining overall authority over the Bank, the Board of Governors delegates most powers to the Board of Directors, which is responsible for approving the EBRD's country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations.

title: EBRD: staff, structure, history
snippet: The EBRD is owned by 77 countries, as well as the European Union and the European Investment Bank. Each shareholder is represented on the Board of Governors, which has overall authority over the Bank. Our President is Odile Renaud-Basso (left). The President manages our work under the guidance of the Board of Directors.
